website_summaries.verdict: The premium off-road tire with a focus on mud, snow, and other loose driving conditions.
pros: Heavy lugs break up the flow of mud as the tire rolls through wet conditions
Shoulder blocks are angled for better cornering performance while the wheel pivots
cons: Tires wear down sooner than other options

customer_reviews.title: My New All Time Favorite Tire
customer_reviews.text: I've ran a few different tire options in 35x12.5x20. These are the quietest, best looking, most aggressive pattern I have seen in a M+S tire. Too early to tell if they will last any decent mileage, but I will see. Very quiet tire on the freeway for how aggressive they are.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bad Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, second set of these. The last about 40k
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Price was significantly less then other online retailers which made me skeptical. Tires arrived at my residence via regular UPS ground, I was curious if it would be freight due to size, and it was not. They are as described and the manufacture date on sidewall shows this year (not old stock). Havent mounted them yet but look good will update if any problems balancing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these tires
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires, and they have been wearing very well so far on my '17 F250 Diesel. They are noisier than the factory Michelins, but that was to be expected. I personally don't think they are too loud for the aggressive tread pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great as expected from Nitto! However they are definitely expensive at 375 each lol
customer_reviews.author: Geovanny

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.  Gre
customer_reviews.text: Fast, free shipping. Tires are perfect. Great quality. I’ve ran Nitto Trail Grapplers for years. Amazon has the best price and convenience of shipping to install location made this transaction a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Mld931

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: Second set. First set lasted 33000 miles on a GMC
customer_reviews.author: R. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are better than I could have ever expected!! Quite on the road. Very aggressive look!!!!
customer_reviews.author: john orcino

customer_reviews.title: Ride great!!
customer_reviews.text: First off this was the best price I found.. tires balanced nicely and ride great!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: awesome tire!
customer_reviews.text: The tires got here on time and look really good on my truck. They are amazing in the mud and I would recommend them to anyone that drives offroad.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Donald J. Trump for President
customer_reviews.text: A great tire for offending commie liberal scumbags. They say.. "Why do you need those?" And I say. "Incase I have to drive over mounds of dead liberals who couldn't handle a natural disaster and die walking to FEMA camps when the end of time comes.. About the only thing these tires can't handle would be climbing over the magnificent wall Trump is going to build.
customer_reviews.author: Dap

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires ride quit and really look awesome so much tread in my weekend truck

customer_reviews.title: Not actual size tire
customer_reviews.text: They are not actual 35s they are like 33 3/4 inch overall they are really good tires but just disappointed not actual 35s.
customer_reviews.author: jerry w.

product_meta.title: Nitto Trail Grappler M/T all_ Season Radial Tire-35X12.50R20/10 121Q
product_meta.description: The all-new Trail Grappler M/T blends some of the off-road performance of the Mud Grappler with the on-road comfort of the Terra Grappler to create a tire that is both aggressive and quiet. For off-road performance, the sidewall combines a 3-ply high turn-up construction with a thick rubber compound that cushions the tire and helps prevent punctures. On the tread surface, the blocks are configured to provide additional biting edges that command lateral stability and enhance forward traction. For on-road comfort, Nitto's engineers used advanced sound analysis equipment to reduce the noise levels commonly associated with off-road tires. The internal construction and tread design also help optimize tread life. Two wide steel belts provide a stable base for the tire and increase tread strength. This advanced construction provides optimal uniformity and reduces irregular wear.
feature_bullets: 3D tapered groove tread adds additional biting edges for off-road exploring
Deep center sipe increases traction on wet surfaces, helping prevent hydroplaning
Reinforced shoulder groove for better performance without compromising block stiffness
Stone ejector helps protect the tread, reject stones, and clear mud
This product is not for sale in the state of Arkansas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
